modifiers.name: Currents
modifiers.description: Communication is disrupted. You cannot place sonar tokens on cards - turn them to red side instead. Others must deduce your meaning.
modifiers.rules_text: When communicating, place cards as normal but turn sonar token to red side. No direct indication of card meaning allowed.

modifiers.name: Rapture of the Deep
modifiers.description: Communication is limited. Place two fewer sonar tokens in the middle than there are crew members. Use tokens to communicate without discussion.
modifiers.rules_text: Use sonar tokens for communication without discussion. No personal tokens; all tokens shared.

modifiers.name: Unfamiliar Terrain
modifiers.description: Before dealing cards, draw a color card to determine communication type: 1-3 normal, 4-6 currents, 7-9 rapture of the deep.
modifiers.rules_text: Draw a color card before dealing. Its value determines communication type for the mission.

modifiers.name: Real-Time Missions
modifiers.description: Play missions in real time. Set a timer based on difficulty level. If time runs out, mission fails.
modifiers.rules_text: Set a timer after task allocation. If time runs out before completion, mission fails.

modifiers.name: Free Selection of Tasks
modifiers.description: Discuss task allocation freely without revealing card details. One crew member can take all tasks.
modifiers.rules_text: Crew members can discuss and allocate tasks without revealing their cards. One can take all tasks.
